getInstance

public static NetworkCommunicatorSpidermonkeyClient getInstance()

isValidConnection

protected java.lang.Boolean isValidConnection()
Checks if networkClient is not null. If so, check every n-th time (see GameSettings.NETWORK_CLIENT_CON_CHECK) whether the connection is fully established.

Returns:
True if a connection to a server is established, else false.

addClientStateListener

public void addClientStateListener(com.jme3.network.ClientStateListener listener)

Parameters:
listener - The client listener.

getPubKey

public java.lang.String getPubKey(java.lang.String pubKeyClient)
Description copied from interface: NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Get the public key from the server for encryption reasons.

Specified by:
getPubKey in interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Parameters:
pubKeyClient - The key from the client so that the public key from the server can be encrypted.
Returns:
The public server key

send

public void send(NetworkMessage message)
Checks at first if there's a valid connection. If so, consider the sleep value in GameSettings.NETWORK_CLIENT_LAG_DELAY to test the lag compensation. After it, send the message.

Specified by:
send in interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Parameters:
message - The message to be transmitted.

join

public boolean join()
Description copied from interface: NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Join a new client to the list of users.

Specified by:
join in interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Returns:
Response from the server if the session could be opened or not.
